DataManager

Data Manager to handle the processing of player data files.

Gedan

showDataMenuDisplay the Save/Load menu

saveGameMenuDisplay the saving interface
generateSavePreviewGenerate a preview of a given slotNumber for use by the display methods
saveGameDataGrab data from around the game and stuff it into a shared object for serialization
saveBaseDataMethod to append the “minimum” version we expect into the save file -- aka version 1
loadGameDataLoad the given slot numbers save data
loadBaseDataMethod to extract the base data from the save object and shuffle it into various game systems.

printThrownError
verifyBlobVerify that ALL of the properties we expect to be present on a save data element, for this version of a save, are present and sane.

public function DataManager()

dataRouter

public function dataRouter(d: MouseEvent = undefined):void

Data router to do a bunch of stuff.  I suspect most of this should be refactored into GUI.as as it almost entirely pertains to display state vis-a-vis the display state of the data manager.

Parameters

param d MouseEvent

Method to extract the base data from the save object and shuffle it into various game systems.  Need to add some error handling in here

verifyBlob

private function verifyBlob(data: Object):Boolean

Verify that ALL of the properties we expect to be present on a save data element, for this version of a save, are present and sane.  This works during both save AND load for the “simple” data.  Probably extend it into complex types later

Parameters

param data Data blob to verify

Returns

Boolean true/false of verification
